name: Sasquatch Sokoban
description:

Challenging isometric puzzling.

Press X for X-Ray Vision™

Character sprites by Alice - [instagram]

No hack link because at 20,000 LOC it tends to crash the editor, but here's one with the first ten levels if you'd like to see how this works - [hack]
